casebody.data:
STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. RICHARD CHARLES LARKIN, Appellant. (No. 9409) 509 P2d 1221 J. Marvin Kuhn, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem.

Argued May 22,

affirmed May 22,

petition for rehearing denied June 14,

petition for review denied September 5, 1973

Gary S. Thompson, District Attorney, Prineville, argued the cause and filed the brief for respondent.

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Langtry and Foley, Judges.
